DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : JAPAN
DOC.TEXT: U.S. Autos and Parts to Be Promoted : The Japan Auto Parts Industries Assn . and the Japan Automobile Importers Assn. , following the example of the Japan Automobile Manufacturers Assn. , announced plans to promote U.S. autos and auto parts.Automobiles and components account_for roughly two-thirds of Japan ' s $ 59-billion trade surplus with the United States . The plan released by the Japan Auto Parts Industries Assn. , which represents 529 Japanese component manufacturers , proposed regular meetings with U.S. auto parts makers to expand business opportunities . The Japan Automobile Importers Assn . said it will increase the number of_import exhibits it holds . The association will also encourage its members to expand sales and maintenance networks for foreign cars .
